body: The necropede has Myr as subtype instead of Insect (At least in the filter screen, haven't test it on play with cards like Myr Galvanizer)

title: Necropede bad sub-type

content:
_From [est...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/112144615059920860021/) on November 05, 2011 04:45:46_

The necropede has Myr as subtype instead of Insect (At least in the filter screen, haven't test it on play with cards like Myr Galvanizer)

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=89_
